executable.title: Demons Registration: Jacobian-based Change Detection
executable.description: Quantifies the changes between two spatially aligned images based on the pixel-wise difference of image intensities.

float.name: sensitivityThreshold
float.description: This parameter should be between 0 and 1, and defines how sensitive the metric should be to the intensity changes.
float.label: Sensitivity

integer.name: changingBandSize
integer.description: How far (in mm) from the boundary of the segmentation should the intensity changes be considered.
integer.label: Changing band size

image.name: baselineVolume
image.label: Baseline Volume
image.description: Baseline volume to be compared to

image.name: baselineSegmentationVolume
image.label: Baseline Segmentation Volume
image.description: Label volume that contains segmentation of the structure of interest in the baseline volume.

image.name: followupVolume
image.label: Followup Volume
image.description: Followup volume to be compare to the baseline

image.name: outputVolume
image.label: Output Volume
image.description: Output volume to keep the results of change quantification.

parameters.label: Report
parameters.description: Specify a file to save the change detection report text.

file.name: tmpDirectory
file.label: Temporary directory location
file.description: Directory where the metric can keep temporary results
